code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import"./login.css";import jwt_decode from"jwt-decode";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){var navigate=useNavigate();var handleCallbackResponse=function handleCallbackResponse(response){var userObject=jwt_decode(response.credential);if(userObject.email_verified===true){navigate("/home");localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(userObject));}document.getElementById("signInDiv").hidden=true;};useEffect(function(){/*global google */google.accounts.id.initialize({client_id:"404982912044-mjreeh2jlsgsildvr4cub2r0auuvvln4.apps.googleusercontent.com",callback:handleCallbackResponse});google.accounts.id.renderButton(document.getElementById("signInDiv"),{theme:"outline",size:"large"});google.accounts.id.prompt();},[]);useEffect(function(){localStorage.setItem("lastsearch","");},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container-login",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"form-h1",children:"Sign in Using Google "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"form-h4",children:"Please sign in with google to reach our website"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"signInDiv",className:"singindiv"})]})});}export default Login;
